Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
sc2002.StudentController
public class StudentController extends Object
Controller class which controls all the logic related to students
Since:
25/11/2023
Author:
Kiersten Yeo

  • Method Details

    • GetInstance

      public static StudentController GetInstance()
      Gets the instance of the StudentController, creating one if it does not already exist
      Returns:
      StudentController instance

    • AddEnquiry

      public void AddEnquiry(int campID, String enquiry, String reply, String replyBy, Student askBy)
      Adds an enquiry to the specified camp and student.
      Parameters:
      campID - ID of the camp
      enquiry - Enquiry to be added
      reply - Reply to the enquiry
      replyBy - CCM or Staff who replied to the enquiry
      askBy - Student to add the enquiry to

    • DeleteEnquiry

      public void DeleteEnquiry(Student askBy, int enquiryID)
      Deletes an enquiry from the specified camp and student.
      Parameters:
      askBy - Student to remove the enquiry from
      enquiryID - ID of the enquiry to be removed

    • EditEnquiry

      public void EditEnquiry(Student askBy, int enquiryID, String newEnquiry)
      Edits an enquiry of the specified camp and student.
      Parameters:
      askBy - Student editing the enquiry
      enquiryID - ID of the enquiry to be edited
      newEnquiry - The edited enquiry to replace the old enquiry

    • StudentMenu

      public void StudentMenu()
      Student main menu for handling various operations.
